TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Kalisahan, title = Kalisahan, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kalisahan} }

S.FORM: Kalisahan Itiniay i Yanping Cen no Taitung ko Kalisahan a niyaro', 51 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 180 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 98% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 176 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 2% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 4 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Bunun 82%, Amis 4%, Paiwan 1%, Puyuma 1%, Thau 1%, roma 10%.

Kalisahan Itiniay i Yanping Cen no Taitong ko Kalisahan a niyaro', 51 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 180 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 98% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 176 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 2% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 4 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Bonon 82%, Amis 4%, Paiwan 1%, Poyoma 1%, Thao 1%, roma 10%.
